title: League crashing once Client opens.
body: When launching League, it opens for a second but typically doesn't stop loading. After loading, it crashes, and brings up the Bugslpat. I've tried re-installing it, and I've tried closing Discord (because I saw a forum post with a similar problem saying discord was the problem).

replies.body:
Trying opening Discord again and make sure to **turn off the overlay feature**. That overlay specifically is what's been giving people problems with League crashing, so let's double check that first.

If that doesn't make any difference though, go ahead and run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and let me know how that helps.
